data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Wizard Castle Inner Tiles
data.detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Wizard Castle Inner Tiles" and "RPG Maker MV - Wizard Castle Inner Tiles" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!


About the Game

There's nothing more magical or mysterious than the inner workings of a wizard's castle! Journey through the mystical halls and explore bookshelves crammed with enchanted tomes and spellbinding scrolls.

Created by Sherman3D, Wizard Castle Inner Tiles is a fun-sized pack featuring the classic medieval wizard castle. From wizard hats to flying brooms, this pack includes fun details to give your wizard castle some personality and charm. Whether you're looking to make your game more magical, or simply wish for a greater variety of tiles, Wizard Castle Inner Tiles is a great addition to your growing library of RPG Maker MZ resources.

Features:
  • Partial Tiles A2 and A4, with recolors - including a variety of walls and floors.
  • Full Tile B, including furniture and essentials.
  • Animated double-door character set with variations.
  • Created and optimized for RPG Maker MZ.

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker only
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
